vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Λευεί (indecl.) and Λευείς (Rec. -υΐ, -υΐς), genitive Λευεί, accusative -είν, ὁ (Heb. H3878)
Levi;
__1. the son of Jacob: Heb.7:5, 9, Rev.7:7.
__2. Son of Melchi: Luk.3:24.
__3. Son of Simeon: Luk.3:29.
__4. Son of Alphæus (cf. Μαθθαῖος): Mrk.2:14 (WH, mg., Ἰάκωβον), Luk.5:27, 29.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.shortDef: Levi, [perhaps] "wild cow" or "person pledged for a debt or vow"
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.24;
son of: Melchi (G3197);
father of: Matthat (G3158)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Leví: (1) discípulo de Jesús; (2) hijo de Jacob; (3, 4) personas en la geneología de Jesús (LUC.3:24,29)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利未 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "連結的"
1) 族長雅各和其妻利亞所生的第三個兒子, 是以色列人利未支派的始祖
2) 麥基的兒子, 耶穌的祖先之一 (路 3:24)
3) 西緬的兒子, 耶穌的祖先之一 (路 3:30)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
利未这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"连结的"
1) 族长雅各和其妻利亚所生的第三个儿子, 是以色列人利未支派的始祖< br>2) 麦基的儿子, 耶稣的祖先之一(路3:24)
3) 西缅的儿子, 耶稣的祖先之一(路3:30)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.29;
son of: Simeon (G4826H);
father of: Matthat (G3158H)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.9.9;
son of: Alphaeus (G0256H); also called Levi at Mrk.2.14; 1x,29;

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.34;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Leah (H3812);
brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Judah (H3063), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783);
half-brother of: Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Gershon (H1648), Kohath (H6955), Merari (H4847) and Jochebed (H3115)
